entry.tran: 防风雨的;经得起日晒雨淋的
entry.def: Something that is weatherproof is made of material which protects it from the weather or keeps out wind and rain.

example.ex: Use a weatherproof rucksack to carry your camera and lenses around in.
example.tran: 用防风雨的帆布背包装照相机和镜头。

means.word_mean: 1. able to withstand exposure to weather without damage;
